00015 void RouteEval :: operator () (Route & __route) 
00016 {
00017   
00018   float len = 0 ;
00019   
00020   for (unsigned int i = 0 ; i < Graph :: size () ; i ++)
00021     {
00022       len -= Graph :: distance (__route [i], __route [(i + 1) % Graph :: size ()]) ; 
00023     }
00024   
00025   __route.fitness (len) ;
00026 }
